Name: Guard
Description: Guards include members of a city watch, sentries in a citadel or fortified town, and the bodyguards of merchants and nobles

Actions.Name: Spear
Actions.Description: Melee or Range Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
